sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:sap-com:document:sap:soap:functions:mc-style"> <soapenv:Header/> <XUpdateCustfields>${XUpdateCustfields}</XUpdateCustfields> <XUpdateDesc>${XUpdateDesc}</XUpdateDesc> <XUpdateTesters>${XUpdateTesters}</XUpdateTesters> <!--Optional:--> <XUpddateTask>${XUpddateTask}</XUpddateTask> <!--Optional:--> <XtCustfields> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <item> <Id>${Id}</Id> <Value>${Value}</Value> </item> </XtCustfields> <!--Optional:--> <XtTesters> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <item> <Testerid>${Testerid}</Testerid> <Targetroleid>${Targetroleid}</Targetroleid> <Targetid>${Targetid}</Targetid> <Systemid>${Systemid}</Systemid> <Mandt>${Mandt}</Mandt> <SmtpAddr>${SmtpAddr}</SmtpAddr> <Testername>${Testername}</Testername> </item> </XtTesters> </urn:_-bti_-teTaskChangeWs> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
